description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity of a Notes application built with Jetpack Compose. It includes UI components for listing, searching, editing, creating, and deleting notes, as well as associated ViewModel and repository classes for managing note data. The file orchestrates the app's UI flow and interacts with the data layer.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity that sets up the app's theme and manages navigation between note list and note edit screens.

classes.name: ScreenState
classes.description: Enum to represent whether the user is viewing the note list or editing a note.

classes.name: NotesMainScreen
classes.description: Composable that manages the main navigation state and displays either the notes list or note editing screen.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: Composable displaying the list of notes with search, add, edit, and delete functionalities.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: Composable representing each note item in the list with edit and delete actions.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: Composable for creating or editing a note, with input fields and save/delete actions.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data class modeling a note with optional ID, title, and content.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: In-memory repository managing note data, supporting CRUD and search operations.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel connecting UI with data layer, handling note operations and search.

classes.name: NotesAppTheme
classes.description: Defines the Material Design theme for the app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Main activity initialization; sets the Compose content.

methods.name: NotesMainScreen
methods.description: Handles navigation between note list and editing screens based on app state.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Filters notes based on search query.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository.
